1.core_themes: House of Self & Identity. Governs personality, appearance, beginnings. Keywords: identity, self‑image, initiative, persona, first impressions.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aries: Aries on the 1st cusp brings bold initiative and direct self‑expression. You project confidence but may need to temper impulsiveness in how you present yourself.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Taurus: Taurus on the 1st cusp grounds your identity in steadiness and sensuality. You appear reliable and composed but may resist necessary personal change.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Gemini: Gemini on the 1st cusp colors your persona with curiosity and adaptability. You come across as communicative and versatile but risk seeming scattered or inconsistent.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Cancer: Cancer on the 1st cusp gives a nurturing, sensitive presence. You project empathy and protectiveness but may seem moody or overly defensive.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Leo: Leo on the 1st cusp highlights a warm, dramatic persona. You shine with creative confidence but may need to guard against prideful or attention‑seeking tendencies.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Virgo: Virgo on the 1st cusp presents a precise, service‑oriented identity. You appear helpful and detail‑focused but may struggle with self‑criticism or perfectionism.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Libra: Libra on the 1st cusp brings a harmonious, diplomatic presence. You project grace and balance but may avoid asserting yourself to keep the peace.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 1st cusp adds intensity and magnetic depth to your persona. You appear powerful and mysterious but may seem secretive or controlling.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Sagittarius: Sagittarius on the 1st cusp gives an adventurous, optimistic identity. You come across as open‑minded and enthusiastic but may overlook practical details.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Capricorn: Capricorn on the 1st cusp shows a disciplined, responsible self‑image. You project maturity and ambition but may seem reserved or overly serious.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aquarius: Aquarius on the 1st cusp highlights a unique, innovative persona. You appear progressive and detached but may struggle with emotional connection.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Pisces: Pisces on the 1st cusp lends a compassionate, imaginative presence. You project empathy and artistry but risk appearing elusive or overly idealistic.

2.core_themes: House of Values & Resources. Governs personal finances, self‑worth, possessions. Keywords: security, values, earnings, material comfort, self‑esteem.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aries: Aries on the 2nd cusp drives assertive pursuit of resources. You are quick to seize opportunities but may act impulsively with money or possessions.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Taurus: Taurus on the 2nd cusp brings steady accumulation and value appreciation. You build security patiently but may resist adapting your values.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Gemini: Gemini on the 2nd cusp values variety and communication in resources. You seek multiple income streams but risk scattered financial focus.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Cancer: Cancer on the 2nd cusp ties security to emotional comfort and home. You nurture resources carefully but may cling to possessions for safety.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Leo: Leo on the 2nd cusp enjoys lavish spending on pleasure and creativity. You are generous with resources but may overspend for status or admiration.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Virgo: Virgo on the 2nd cusp focuses on practical budgeting and service‑based earnings. You manage resources methodically but risk over‑planning or worry.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Libra: Libra on the 2nd cusp seeks balance between giving and receiving. You value aesthetic possessions but may hesitate in financial decisions.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 2nd cusp transforms resources through shared investments. You handle finances with depth but risk power struggles over money.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Sagittarius: Sagittarius on the 2nd cusp pursues abundance through exploration and learning. You seek opportunities abroad but may overlook saving for the future.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Capricorn: Capricorn on the 2nd cusp builds long‑term wealth through discipline. You are strategic with resources but risk workaholic attitudes toward earning.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aquarius: Aquarius on the 2nd cusp values unconventional resources and ideals. You innovate in finances but may detach emotionally from material security.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Pisces: Pisces on the 2nd cusp finds security through creative and spiritual resources. You are generous and imaginative but risk vague boundaries around your possessions.

3.core_themes: House of Communication & Learning. Governs siblings, local environment, thinking, short‑trips. Keywords: communication, ideas, learning, connections, curiosity.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aries: Aries on the 3rd cusp sparks direct, enthusiastic communication. You speak with confidence but may interrupt or rush conversations.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Taurus: Taurus on the 3rd cusp brings practical, steady thinking. You value concrete facts but may resist new ideas or change in perspective.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Gemini: Gemini on the 3rd cusp excels in versatile dialogue and networking. You adapt quickly but risk superficiality or scattered attention.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Cancer: Cancer on the 3rd cusp communicates with emotional sensitivity. You nurture through words but may become overly sentimental or defensive.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Leo: Leo on the 3rd cusp adds dramatic flair to your speech and learning. You captivate audiences but may dominate conversations.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Virgo: Virgo on the 3rd cusp brings analytical precision to communication. You craft clear, detailed messages but risk over‑analyzing or worry.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Libra: Libra on the 3rd cusp seeks balanced and diplomatic dialogue. You mediate ideas gracefully but may avoid conflict or decisive expression.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 3rd cusp probes deeply in thought and conversation. You uncover hidden truths but risk obsession or intense debates.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Sagittarius: Sagittarius on the 3rd cusp expands thinking through exploration and philosophy. You inspire ideas but may overlook practical details.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Capricorn: Capricorn on the 3rd cusp structures learning with disciplined study. You build solid knowledge but may resist playful or creative learning styles.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aquarius: Aquarius on the 3rd cusp brings innovative, unconventional ideas. You think ahead of your time but risk seeming detached or erratic.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Pisces: Pisces on the 3rd cusp blends imagination with communication. You express creatively but may blur facts or become vague.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aries: Aries on the 4th cusp brings dynamic energy to home life. You initiate change in your roots but may clash with family over autonomy.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Taurus: Taurus on the 4th cusp values stability and comfort in the household. You create a nurturing environment but may resist moving beyond familiar patterns.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Gemini: Gemini on the 4th cusp fosters lively family communication. You connect through conversation but risk scattered attention at home.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Cancer: Cancer on the 4th cusp deepens emotional bonds with family. You excel at nurturing but may become overly protective or moody.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Leo: Leo on the 4th cusp brings warmth and creativity to home. You host joyously but may seek attention or drama within the family.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Virgo: Virgo on the 4th cusp organizes home life with care. You maintain order and health but risk over‑critical attitude in domestic matters.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Libra: Libra on the 4th cusp seeks harmony in your private sphere. You cultivate peace but may avoid addressing deeper familial tensions.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 4th cusp brings intensity to your roots. You transform family patterns but may struggle with power dynamics at home.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Sagittarius: Sagittarius on the 4th cusp seeks freedom through exploring family traditions. You honor heritage but may feel restless in domestic settings.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Aquarius: Aquarius on the 4th cusp values individuality in the home. You embrace unconventional living but risk detachment from family ties.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Pisces: Pisces on the 4th cusp brings compassion and imagination to your roots. You create a sanctuary of empathy but may escape through fantasy.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 5th cusp brings intense passion and transformative art. You delve deep into projects but may become obsessive over outcomes.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Sagittarius: Sagittarius on the 5th cusp infuses play with adventurous spirit. You explore boldly but risk overextending or losing focus.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Pisces: Pisces on the 5th cusp dreamily creates and loves. You bring deep imagination to pleasure but may blur boundaries or escape reality.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Libra: Libra on the 8th cusp balances power dynamics in relationships. You mediate shared affairs gracefully but may avoid confronting deep issues.
sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 8th cusp intensifies regeneration and uncovering secrets. You transform profoundly but may struggle with obsessive control.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Virgo: Virgo on the 10th cusp brings meticulous service and expertise to your public role. You excel in detail‑oriented tasks but may worry excessively about performance.

sign_on_cusp_interpretations.Scorpio: Scorpio on the 10th cusp transforms public image through intensity and strategic power. You regenerate your reputation but may provoke power struggles.
